About

Chris Muccioli is a multi-disciplinary designer and art director living and working in Brooklyn, NY.

Originally from the suburbs just north of Baltimore, Chris graduated from the Maryland Institute College of Art. He moved to New York City in 2011 to join Kickstarter as one of itâ€™s first visual designers focused on building out and maintaining the Kickstarter brand.

He has previously worked in a variety of studio and agency environments from Kickstarter, Post Typography & 160over90. Most recently he was the Head of Design at Jukely where he led the re-design, re-focus, and re-launch of the Jukely live music subscription product.
